text: Erkin Adylbek Uulu (born February 14, 1991) is a Kyrgyzstani boxer. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's light heavyweight event, in which he was eliminated in the round of 32 by Juan Carlos Carrillo. He was the flag bearer for Kyrgyzstan at the Parade of Nations. ==References== == External links == * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Kyrgyzstani male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of Kyrgyzstan Category:Boxers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Light-heavyweight boxers
title: Erkin Adylbek Uulu
